articles.title: Want to know how much money Joel Osteen's megachurch received? - Chron
articles.description: The largest single-site megachurch in the U.S. received a PPP loan during the pandemic.
articles.content: Lakewood Church received a $4.4. million Paycheck Protection Plan loan during the coronavirus pandemic, according to federal data. The loan was disbursed in July of this year.U.S. Small Business Admi… [+1841 chars]
